attributes.action: Make 28th July 2014 first World War centinary a bank holiday monday
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to commemorate 100 years since the start of the first world war also known as the great war.As a mark of respect to all the people who lost their lives fighting for this country between 1914 and 1918.The centenary falls on 28th July 2014 which coincidentally is a monday.
